remarks: Concluding disjunction from implication for a decidable proposition. Based on theorem *2.68 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 108.  Converse of ~ pm2.62 and one half of ~ dfor2dc .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 27-Mar-2018.)
statement: pm2.68dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ps ) -> ( ph \/ ps ) ) ) $.
